Package model.Board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    A Singleton class representing the Board of the game. This class is responsible for determining player turns, board initialization,determining the winner and more.

      • getInstance

        public static Board getInstance()
        Accessor function which returns the only instance of the Board class.
        Returns:
        The only instance of the Board class

      • initializeBoard

        public void initializeBoard​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
        Performs all necessary initializations to guarantee that the game will flow as expected. This includes but is not limited to :card distribution, bag initialization, player turn order determination, etc.

      • createPlayerCards

        private Card[] createPlayerCards​(Player owner)
        Creates a set of cards for a player consisting of a single copy of each one.
        Returns:
        A set of cards

      • takeTileFromArea

        public void takeTileFromArea​(Player player,
                             Tile tile)
                      throws Exceptions.NotRemovableTileException,
                             Exceptions.NoSuchTileFoundException
        Removes a tile from the tile area that matches the given tile type and gives it to the passed player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to whom the tile will be given
        tile - The tile to take from the respective tile area. Precondition: player != null, a tile of the given type exists in the respective area & tile is a valid tile type (i.e. Amphora,Mosaic,etc.) Postcondition: A tile of the matching type will be removed from the appropriate area and given to the player
        Throws:
        Exceptions.NotRemovableTileException - When the given tile class is a non removable type (i.e. landslide tiles)
        Exceptions.NoSuchTileFoundException - When a tile area doesn't contain a tile matching the given attributes of the tile

      • determinePlayOrder

        private void determinePlayOrder​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
        Randomly determines the order in which the given players will be taking turns
        Parameters:
        players - The player list

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws tiles from the bag and places them on the board

      • drawAndPlaceInitialTiles

        public void drawAndPlaceInitialTiles()
        Draws a tile of each type and places it in the appropriate area. Important: Use only during game initialization

      • addTileToArea

        private void addTileToArea​(Tile tile)
                    throws Exceptions.IllegalTileTypeException
        Helper function which places the given tile in the appropriate tile area of the board based on its type.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile to place
        Throws:
        Exceptions.IllegalTileTypeException - When the given tile isn't of a valid tile type

      • shouldGameEnd

        public boolean shouldGameEnd()
        Observer function that checks whether or not the game should end.
        Returns:
        True if the game should end, false otherwise.

      • playCard

        public void playCard​(Player player,
                     Card card)
        Plays the given card from the given player's hand.
        Parameters:
        player - The player playing the card
        card - The card being played

      • determineWinner

        public void determineWinner​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
        Determines the winner of the game once it has ended.
        Parameters:
        players - The player list. Precondition: The game has ended (shouldGameEnd() == true) Postcondition: The points earned by each player will be successfully set
